lyrics:
14 contributorsfriend of mine lyricsverse 1
i dont want us to have a fight
but in the background i can hear you chatting shite
i hear it every night
and you think youre being really cool
and youve been doing it since we were both at school
now who looks like a fool

soon youll be a nervous wreck

dont know you anymore
